#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int

int main(){
	ll n;
	char inp[109];
	cin>>n;
	while(n--){
		cin>>inp;
		ll p,q;
		cin>>p>>q;
		map<char, ll> f;
		int len = strlen(inp);
		for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i)
		{
			char c = inp[i];
			if(f.find(c) != f.end()){
				f[c] += 1;
			}else{
				f[c] = 1;
			}
		}
		ll cum = 0;
		for (std::map<char, ll>::iterator i = f.begin(); i != f.end(); ++i)
		{
			i->second = cum + (i->second*p);
			cum = i->second;
		}

		for (int i = 0; i < q; ++i)
		{
			ll n_;
			cin>>n_;
			if (n_ > cum)
			{
				cout<<-1<<endl;
				continue;
			}
			for (std::map<char, ll>::iterator i = f.begin(); i != f.end(); ++i)
			{
				if(n_ <= i->second){
					cout<<i->first<<endl;
					break;
				}
			}
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
